subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Testosterone
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis’s defense that his drug tests were not handled properly does not negate the findings, the World Anti-Doping Agency chairman, Dick Pound, said Sunday.
snippet: Floyd Landis’s defense that his drug tests were not handled properly does not negate the findings, the World Anti-Doping Agency chairman, Dick Pound, said Sunday.
